title: OAuth scope validator
author: Nolan X.
description: Validates that requested OAuth scopes are approved.

es.title: Validador de scopes OAuth
es.description: Valida que los scopes OAuth solicitados estén aprobados.

lines.content: def scopes_allowed(requested: list[str], allowed: list[str]) -> bool:
return any(scope in allowed for scope in requested)

bugPatterns.description: Allows requests if any single scope matches instead of requiring every requested scope.

localizedDescription.es: Permite solicitudes si un único scope coincide en lugar de exigir que todos los scopes solicitados estén permitidos.
